name: English Pronunciation
description: Offline access to English pronunciation is possible with English Pronunciation app. Learn English pronunciation by listening to how words are pronounced and repeating them. It is important to learn the right pronunciation of English words from the beginning. Learn English pronunciation the right way by practicing every day. Learn English daily through practice using this Real English Pronunciation app to improve your pronunciation of words.   English Pronunciation is a quick tool to reach out to when in doubt of pronouncing any English word. Simply enter the text and you will hear a pronunciation of the word. To enhance your pronunciation, English pronunciation allows you to choose the English accent with which to pronounce the text. Tap on the flag at the top right corner of the screen to select either an American or British pronunciation. Learn the different pronunciations of words in British and American English accents.  Dont argue with friends over which pronunciation is American and which one is British. Just use this app to settle your differences. It is very useful to all, students, teachers, workers, etc. who may need to check the pronunciation of a word on the go. It is a simple app to help you learn and speak English the right way.  Improve your English pronunciation skills to prepare for the TOEFL, IELTS, and TOEIC exams. Speak confidently with your friends, boss, colleagues, and tourists. Good pronunciation is essential for learning, speaking and understanding spoken English well.  The ultimate mobile English pronunciation app for both students and teachers. The English Pronunciation app helps you learn, practice and play with British pronunciation and American pronunciation of words wherever you are. This English pronunciation app teaches you how to pronounce English text properly. English pronunciation app: learn English, speak English, and speak it right!   Learning to pronounce words correctly in the English language using different accents should not be difficult with this pronunciation app. this English Pronunciation app, is built purposely for your pronunciation needs. Use it as a pronunciation aid wherever you are. No need to struggle with pronunciation anymore. English pronunciation app is the app you need to make your English pronunciation better!  Main Features:  - American and British pronunciations - Use the flag icon to select language - Word pronunciation word history - Ability to control the pitch - Delete and restore deleted words (just swipe) - Works perfectly offline too
